channel.title: Softlayer_container_knowledgelayer_questionanswer on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_container_knowledgelayer_questionanswer on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_KnowledgeLayer_QuestionAnswer
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_KnowledgeLayer_QuestionAnswer Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_KnowledgeLayer_QuestionAnswer models a single question and answer pair from SoftLayer’s KnowledgeLayer knowledge base. SoftLayer’s backend network interfaces with the KnowledgeLayer to recommend helpful articles when support tickets are created. External Links The SoftLayer Knowledge Layer associatedMethods SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject::getTopFiveKnowledgeLayerQuestions Local answer The answer to a question asked on the SoftLayer KnowledgeLayer. Type: string link The link to a question asked on the SoftLayer KnowledgeLayer.
